Footer.description: Bogga rasmiga ah ee isgaarsiinta iyo macluumaadka dadweynaha ee Dowladda Federaalka Soomaaliya.

services.title: Codsiga Visa
services.description: Gudbi codsiyada Visa una hubso shuruudaha gelitaanka.

services.title: Diiwaangelinta Ganacsiga
services.description: Diiwaangeli ganacsiyo cusub isla markaana maamul rukhsadaha.

services.title: Aqoonsiga Qaranka
services.description: Hel adeegyada aqoonsiga dijitaalka ah iyo cusboonaysiinta.

services.title: Bogga E-Baasaboor
services.description: Codso ama cusboonaysii Baasaboor Soomaaliga Biometric.

CookieConsent.message: Waxaan isticmaalnaa cookies si aan u wanaajino khibraddaada isla markaana u falanqeyno isticmaalka bogga. Markaad sii waddo, waxaad oggolaatay isticmaalka cookies. <privacyLink>Akhri Siyaasadda Asturnaanta</privacyLink>

InvestPage.title: Maalgeli Soomaaliya
InvestPage.description: Furitaanka awoodda Geeska Afrika — suuq furan oo u diyaarsan koboc iyo hal-abuurnimo.

cards.title: Goob Istaraatiiji ah
cards.description: Albaabka u dhexeeya Badda Cas iyo Badweynta Hindiya, kuna xira Afrika, Bariga Dhexe, iyo Aasiya.

cards.title: Kheyraad Aan Weli La Faa’iideysan
cards.description: Xeebta ugu dheer Afrika, dhul beereed ballaaran, iyo keyd tamareed oo aan la horumarin.

cards.title: Jawiga Ganacsi ee La Casriyeeyay
cards.description: Xeerarka cusub ee shirkadaha iyo nidaamka SBRS ayaa fududeeyay bilaabista ganacsiga.

items.title: Xoolaha Nool
items.description: Tiirka dhaqaalaha qaranka iyo hormuudka dhoofinta xoolaha nool.

items.title: Beeraha
items.description: Dhul bacrin ah oo ku teedsan wabiyada Shabeelle iyo Jubba.

items.title: Tamarta La Cusboonaysiin Karo
items.description: Awood sare oo qorrax iyo dabayl ah oo diyaar u ah maalgelin.

items.title: Dekedaha iyo Saadka
items.description: Goob istaraatiiji ah oo ku taal marinada ganacsiga caalamiga ah.

items.title: ICT iyo Maaliyadda
items.description: Bulsho ku tiirsan lacagaha mobilka iyo adeegyada fintech.

items.title: Dalxiiska iyo Martigelinta
items.description: Xeebo dabiici ah iyo goobo taariikhi ah oo leh fursado dalxiis.

items.title: Diiwaangeli Shirkad
items.description: Gudbi codsigaaga adigoo adeegsanaya bogga SBRS.

items.title: Hel Rukhsad
items.description: La shaqee Wasaaradda Ganacsiga si aad u hesho rukhsadaha.

items.title: Dhiirrigelinta Maalgashiga
items.description: La xiriir SOMINVEST si aad u hesho dhiirrigelinta mudnaanta leh.

VisionPage.title: Himilada Qaranka ee Boqol-Sano 2060
VisionPage.description: Khariidad-hagaajin lagu gaari karo Soomaaliya ammaan ah, dimoqraadi ah, isla markaana barwaaqo ah marka la gaaro boqol-guuradii xornimada.

mission.title: Safarka ku wajahan 2060
mission.body: Himilada 2060 waa qaab-dhismeedka fog ee Soomaaliya u dejisay isbeddel qaran, kuna saleysan maamul hufan, koboc loo wada dhan yahay, iyo tayada nololeed oo sarreysa.

items.title: Siyaasad loo wada dhan yahay & Dimuqraadiyeyn
items.description: Dhameystirka Dastuurka Federaalka iyo hirgelinta hal-qof-hal-cod.

items.title: Amni & Ku-dhaqanka Sharciga
items.description: La wareegidda amniga qaranka, dib-u-dhiska Ciidanka Qaranka, iyo maxkamado madax-bannaan.

items.title: Koboca Dhaqaalaha
items.description: Ka faa’iideysiga Dhaqaalaha Buluugga ah, beeraha, iyo tamarta.

items.title: Horumarinta Bulshada
items.description: Maalgelinta waxbarashada, caafimaadka, iyo awoodsiinta haweenka iyo dhalinyarada.

items.title: Ku Biirista EAC
items.description: Xubin ka noqoshada Bulshada Bariga Afrika.

items.title: Cafinta Daymaha (HIPC)
items.description: Dhameystirka hanaanka cafinta daymaha.

items.title: Dib-u-eegista Dastuurka & Doorashooyinka
items.description: Horumarinta dimuqraadiyadda iyo maamul-wanaagga.

items.title: Himilooyinka SDGs
items.description: Horumar la taaban karo oo ku wajahan SDGs.

items.title: Xuska Boqol-Guurada
items.description: Soomaaliya ammaan ah, dimuqraadi ah, oo barwaaqo ah.

downloads.title: Qorshaha Horumarinta Qaranka (NDP-9)
downloads.body: Hel dukumiintiga siyaasadeed ee hagaya isbeddelka fog ee qaranka.

ServicesPage.title: Adeegyada Muwaadiniinta
ServicesPage.description: Hel adeegyada dowladda, kuwa online iyo kuwa goob-joog ah.

digital.title: Adeegyada Dijitaalka ah
digital.description: Bogag ammaan ah oo lagu helo adeegyada muhiimka ah ee dowladda.

items.title: Diiwaangelinta Ganacsiga
items.description: Ku diiwaangeli shirkad adigoo adeegsanaya SBRS.

items.title: Codsiga E-Visa
items.description: Codso Visa gelitaan (Dalxiis/Ganacsi).

items.title: Natiijooyinka Imtixaannada Qaranka
items.description: Hubi natiijooyinka Fasalka 8aad iyo 12aad.

items.title: Macluumaadka Baasaboor
items.description: Soo degso foomamka iyo shuruudaha.

general.title: Adeegyada Guud
general.description: Adeegyo si toos ah looga helo xafiisyada gobollada.

items.title: Ruqsadda Darawalnimada
items.description: Waxaa laga helaa Taliska Booliiska Taraafikada iyo xarumaha gobollada.

items.title: Diiwaangelinta Rayidka
items.description: Shahaadooyinka Dhalashada iyo Guurka ee Degmooyinka.

items.title: Diiwaangelinta Dhulka
items.description: Maamulka Gobolka Banaadir / Maxkamadaha Maxalliga ah.

emergency.title: Gargaarka Degdegga ah
emergency.description: Lambarrada degdegga ah ee xaaladaha halista ah.

items.title: Booliis
items.description: Ka warbixinta dambiyada iyo khataraha degdegga ah.

items.title: Ambalaas
items.description: Gargaarka caafimaad ee degdegga ah.

items.title: Dab-damis
items.description: La-tacaalidda dabka iyo samatabbixinta.

items.title: Bisha Cas
items.description: Gargaarka bani’aadantinimo.

items.title: Khadka Talooyinka NISA
items.description: Warbixinno amni iyo digniino khatar.

ConstitutionPage.title: Dastuurka Ku-Meelgaarka ah
ConstitutionPage.description: Sharciga ugu sarreeya ee Jamhuuriyadda Federaalka ee Soomaaliya.

sections.title: Cutubka 1aad: Ku Dhawaaqidda Jamhuuriyadda
sections.body: Soomaaliya waa Jamhuuriyad Federaalka ah, Madax-bannaan, Dimuqraadi ah, kuna dhisan Dastuurka iyo Shareecada Islaamka.

sections.title: Cutubka 2aad: Xuquuqda Aasaasiga ah
sections.body: Karaamada aadanaha, sinaanta, xorriyadda hadalka, iyo xuquuqda eedeysanaha waa la dhowrayaa.

sections.title: Cutubka 3aad: Dhulka iyo Hantida
sections.body: Dhulku waa hanti dadweyne oo ay maamusho dowladda.

sections.title: Cutubka 4aad: Matalaadda Dadweynaha
sections.body: Doorashooyinka iyo xisbiyada siyaasadeed ayaa saldhig u ah matalaadda.

sections.title: Cutubka 5aad: Qaybsiga Awoodaha
sections.body: Awoodaha waxaa loo kala saaray Dowladda Federaalka iyo Dowlad-goboleedyada.
